evidence_over_authority.name: Evidence Over Authority
evidence_over_authority.description: Claims must be backed by data, not credentials

reproducibility.name: Reproducibility Is Mandatory
reproducibility.description: Methods and data sources must be specified for replication

adversarial_survival.name: Adversarial Survival
adversarial_survival.description: Confidence earned through challenges, not assertions

disagreement_as_signal.name: Disagreement Is Signal
disagreement_as_signal.description: Variance across evaluators reveals uncertainty, not failure

versioned_hypotheses.name: Hypotheses Are Versioned
versioned_hypotheses.description: Refinement over time, never declared final truth

show_work.name: Agents Must Show Work
show_work.description: Reasoning must be transparent and traceable

memory_matters.name: Memory Matters
memory_matters.description: Prior research should inform current evaluation

novelty_tested.name: Novelty Must Pass Tests
novelty_tested.description: Novel ideas welcome but held to same rigor

uncertainty_over_wrong.name: Prefer Uncertainty Over Wrong
uncertainty_over_wrong.description: Better to be less certain than confidently incorrect

challenge_others.name: Challenge Other
challenge_others.description: Challenge others to help improve their argument to be more factual.
